text: Deenei laa, gidaadou gaa budu tadau Hagamiami Pasoobaa, hagalee ne hai gi nia palaawaa ne hagatanga gi nia ‘yeast’ pobo, nia ‘yeast’ o di huaidu mo nia haihai milimilia, gei ne hai gi nia palaawaa ala digi unugia gi nia ‘yeast’, nia palaawaa ala e madammaa gei e donu.5.8 Exodus 13.7; Deuteronomy 16.3
